definition.name: Deploy to Deno Deploy
definition.description: Deploy your applications to Deno Deploy, right from GitHub Actions
definition.author: Deno Land Inc

inputs.name: deno-config
inputs.description: The path to a deno config file that will populate other inputs (optional, deno.json and deno.jsonc are auto-discovered)

inputs.name: project
inputs.description: The name or ID of the project to deploy (required)

inputs.name: entrypoint
inputs.description: The path or URL to the entrypoint file (required)

inputs.name: import-map
inputs.description: The path or URL to an import map file

inputs.name: include
inputs.description: Only upload files that match this pattern (multiline and/or comma-separated)

inputs.name: exclude
inputs.description: Exclude files that match this pattern (multiline and/or comma-separated)

inputs.name: root
inputs.description: The path to the directory containing the code and assets to upload

inputs.name: import-map-autogen-temp
inputs.description: The path to store the auto-generated import map if deno config file is present (relative to root)

outputs.name: deployment-id
outputs.description: The ID of the created deployment

outputs.name: url
outputs.description: The URL where the deployment is reachable
